name: Lamar WHITE and Lois White, Appellees v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, an Agency of the Commonwealth and Bradley Mallory, Secretary of Transportation, Appellants
name_abbreviation: White v. Pennsylvania Department of Transportation

parties: Lamar WHITE and Lois White, Appellees v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, an Agency of the Commonwealth and Bradley Mallory, Secretary of Transportation, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 19th day of October, 2000, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
It is further ordered that the Application For Advancement Pursuant to Pa.R.A.P. 2313 is DENIED as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
759 A.2d 1273
Lamar WHITE and Lois White, Appellees v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, an Agency of the Commonwealth and Bradley Mallory, Secretary of Transportation, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 19, 2000.
